getFontSizeCookie

public static java.lang.String getFontSizeCookie(org.zkoss.zk.ui.Execution exe)
Returns the font size specified in cookies
Parameters:
exe - Execution
Returns:
"lg" for larger font, "sm" for smaller font or "" for normal font.

public static java.lang.String getThemeStyle(org.zkoss.zk.ui.Execution exe)

Parameters:
exe - Execution
Returns:
the name of the theme or "" for default theme.
